verses.roman:
śrīvāsādi yata mahāprabhura bhakta-gaṇa
nija nija bhāve karena caitanya-sevana

synonyms: śrīvāsa-ādi—headed by Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura; yata—all; mahāprabhura—of Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bhakta-gaṇa—devotees; nija nija—in their own respective; bhāve—emotions; karena—do; caitanya-sevana—service to Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: All the devotees of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, headed by Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura, have their own emotional humors in which they render service unto Him.
